views.markdown:
(Previously Tap Tap for Netflix) Enables double tap to skip +/- 10 seconds and force touch to play/pause on some popular video apps. Supported Apps: Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, Youtube, Crunchyroll, HBO Go (Partial Support).

There are no settings to configure.

Check it out


No Screenshots for this item.

Added support for: Amazon Prime Video Youtube CrunchyRoll HBO-Go (Partial) You can now force touch the screen to play/pause the video.

Fixed issue on iPhone X where double tapping would also zoom the video in. Now Double tapping in the middle 20% of the screen will zoom in/out and tapping on the left and right 40% will go forward and backwards
